Title: Carrots & Bugs
Description: A JavaScript game in which the bugs and carrots are randomly positioned in a field. Within a limited time, the user needs to click on all the carrots without clicking any bugs.

Title: YouTube Clone
Description: A YouTube Clone website that shows most popular videos and provides search function using YouTube APIs

Title: Pizzageddon
Description: A pizza website that shows the pizza menu retrieved from the JSON file , allows customers to add a pizza to a cart and provides contact form validation .

Title: Joke Generator
Description: A random joke generator website. When the user clicks the button, robot gets a random joke using joke API and says it outloud using speech API .

Title: RoboFriends
Description: A Robo Friends app that shows a list of users from JSON placeholder API . The features include filtering of users, serach box and error boundary message.

Title: Light and Dark Mode
Description: A website that changes the color of its contents based on the color mode that user choses.

Title: Music Player
Description: It's a simple music player that has play, stop, next, previous, and showing time duration functions.

Title: QuoteGenerator
Description: A website that generates a random quote when a user clicks the button and provides a function to tweet it.
